Type: Corner Store/Convenience Store Grocer/Small Grocery Store
Corner Store/Convenience Store Grocer/Small Grocery Store

Visible Street Address: Corner of Landmarks Blvd. & Henry Street

Notes: Chicago Patchwork Farms offers a sliding scale model for their CSA that is picked up from their farm stand. It includes 6-10 pounds of seasonal veggies depending on the week. Customers will pay up front a portion for the season and then monthly installments which will be matched by the Link match program.
The Farm Stand has a sliding scale pay as you please model.

Visible Street Address Line 2: University Ave.at Oak St. behind Hilton Garden Inn

Partner Program Name: Du Quoin State Fair Farmers Market

Visible Street Address: Corner of Coal Road and Rte 51 South

Notes: Households purchase 7 shares of produce to be provided every other week during the summer
Check website for days, hours, and location

Partner Program Name: Gary Comer Youth Center Farmers Market
Glenview Farmer's Market at Historic Wagner Farm

Notes: Growing Homes will be operating this mobile market as a pop-up. Weekly locations will rotate and help service locations where grocery stores have closed.

Partner Program Name: It Takes A Village Community Farm Farm Stand

Notes:
Ordering: Customers order on the website, www.jdlf.org, between noon on Friday and noon on Monday. 

Delivery: Orders are available for pickup at multiple locations on Tuesday afternoon and evening.

On-line ordering: Fridays 12pm - Tuesdays 8pm

Pick-up/delivery: Thursday afternoons

Ordering: Orders can be made at any time during the season for weekly or bi-weekly deliveries. 

Deliveries: Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday based on location. Members are charged weekly $25 for their share of fruits/vegetables, bread, eggs, and mushrooms.
From June - September market also happens on Wednesday from 07:00 AM - 11:00 AM

Visible Street Address Line 2: Corner of Auburn St. and N. Main St.

Partner Program Name: Saint James Community Farm Farm Stand

Notes:
Ordering: Anyone with a Link Card or Debit/Credit Card living in Cook County can shop online any day of the week.

Delivery: Home deliveries take place every Saturday and Monday based on zip code and are free for all customers.
Link Match: SNAP purchases are matched dollar-for-dollar up to $25 as a Link Match Coupon Code.

Partner Program Name: Urban Growers Collective Collective Supported Agriculture/CSA
Notes:
CSA runs June through November. Each CSA box is stocked with vegetables and herbs from UGC farms, micro greens from Urban Eden, fruit from Seedling Farm, and occasionally produce grown by our Incubator Farmers.

We offer both half shares (5-6 items per week) and full shares (10-12 items per week).

Members pick up their shares each week at the South Chicago Farm, the Roosevelt Square Farm and at select pick-up sites in the City (TBD for 2024 season)

Partner Program Name: Village of Fox Lake Farmers Market
Vine Street Market at O'Fallon Station

Notes:
Forty Acres Fresh Market runs a residential produce box delivery service. 

Ordering: Orders are placed online for weekly, biweekly, or monthly subscriptions or one time deliveries. Minimum order for delivery is $10.

Delivery: Sunday, Monday, Wednesday, and Fridays (barring any service changes due to holidays or inclement weather) throughout the city and select I-290 western suburbs based on zip code.
